channel.title: PVP command help
channel.description:
okai im hear today to ask if anyone can help me make a ::pvpon and ::pvpoff command.
so that when u type in ::pvpon it turns everything around you into a pvpzone. and ::pvp off obviously turns that mode off. but i want it so that when you type ::pvpon it takes 30 seconds to do ::pvpoff. thank you if you can help.

item.title: PVP command help
item.dc:creator: @igotguts3 igotguts3

okai im hear today to ask if anyone can help me make a ::pvpon and ::pvpoff command.

so that when u type in ::pvpon it turns everything around you into a pvpzone. and ::pvp off obviously turns that mode off. but i want it so that when you type ::pvpon it takes 30 seconds to do ::pvpoff. thank you if you can help.
